references.paper_title: Tensor product variable binding and the representation of symbolic structures in connectionist systems
references.reason: This paper introduces the Tensor Product Representation (TPR) framework, which is the foundation of the current work and is extensively discussed and analyzed in the paper.

references.paper_title: Learning to reason with third order tensor products
references.reason: This paper proposes a TPR-based memory network (TPR-RNN), which is used as one of the baseline models in the experiments.

references.paper_title: Learning associative inference using fast weight memory
references.reason: This paper introduces another TPR-based model (FWM), which is also used as a baseline model for comparisons in the experimental results.

references.paper_title: Hybrid computing using a neural network with dynamic external memory
references.reason: This paper introduces a neural network with dynamic external memory, which is related to the memory mechanisms discussed in the context of the TPR framework.
This paper proposes an object-centric learning method, which served as inspiration for addressing the decomposition problem in TPR-based models.
